build.buildCommand: npm run build && mkdir -p storage/framework/{sessions,views,cache,testing} storage/logs bootstrap/cache && chmod -R 777 storage public/build && ls -la public/build/ || echo 'No build folder'

deploy.startCommand: chmod -R 777 storage bootstrap/cache && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && php artisan migrate --force && frankenphp run --config /Caddyfile
